Name: Sharpened Blade
Effect: Combat Start Boost Slash dice Power by +2 for this Scene

Dices.Dice 2: slash: 1~3 On Hit Inflict 2 Bleednext Scene

Obtained: Book of Kurokumo Clan, Book of Sayo, Book of Yang, Book of Gin

Name: Multislash
Effect: On Use Draw 1 Page. If Singleton , restore 2 Light as well

Name: Will of the Prescript
Effect: On Use If Singleton , draw 3 pages

Name: Loosen Up

Dices.Dice 1: pierce: 2~8 On Clash Win Gain 1 Strengthnext Scene

Name: Fleet Edge

Dices.Dice 2: pierce: 3~8 On Hit Gain 1 Hastenext Scene
